dblp.social.preparser
Class PartInfo

java.lang.Object
  dblp.social.preparser.PartInfo

public class PartInfo
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines a structure used to memorize informations relative to a single _part file Each generated _part file is described by its name, length and the number of inserted checkpoints (the checkpoint number 0 is also included)

Author:
Staffiero
